mapper.select: SELECT T.rule_id, T.rule_condition, T.status_cd, T.create_dt FROM rule_entrance T WHERE T.STATUS_CD = '0' ORDER BY T.rule_id
SELECT T.rule_id, T.rule_code, T.rule_name, T.rule_desc,T.rule_level,T.rule_type,T.rule_url,T.status_cd,T.create_dt FROM rule T WHERE T.status_cd = '0'

SELECT T.rule_id, T.rule_node, T.data_from_flag, T.db_sql, T.default_value, T.node_existed, T.proc_param_flag, T.is_reverse, T.is_log, T.error_code, T.error_msg, T.remark, T.seq, T.data_stack_flag_prefix, T.jpath, T.status_cd, T.create_dt FROM rule_cond_cfg T WHERE T.rule_id = #{ruleId} AND status_cd = '0' ORDER BY seq
SELECT T.groupId, T.groupName, T.order_seq, T.key_identify_logic_str FROM rule_group T WHERE T.status_cd = '0' ORDER BY T.order_seq
SELECT T.groupId, T.rule_id FROM group_rule_relation T WHERE T.status_cd = '0'
